src:
Best of Blender Artists: 2019, week 44
01 Nov 2019, 10:40 by Bart Veldhuizen
Every week, hundreds of artists share their work on the Blender Artists forum. I'm putting some of the best work in the spotlight in a weekly post here on BlenderNation.


























































































































































Hellboy 


Halloween Autumn Cabin 


The Bedroom 


Catrina’s Halloween (Izzy Burton’s illustration) 


Marina 


Rose Tea 


Carmen Sandiego (2019) bust 


Class touch 


Chocolate Muffins with Strawberries and Blueberries 


Afro Princess Chinyere 


Green corner 


Grapsus Grapsus - Sally Lightfoot Crab 


Wooden passive house placed in the middle of a deciduous forest 


Iron Man Mk XVII 


My Artwork ” The Forest Scene ” Featured on the 3DArtist Magazine issue 138 


Spies in disguise - Lance Sterling 


Baby Slug 


A Samurai Warrior 


THE BLUE HOUSE - Recreating a photo on Houzz 


TrickerTreater 


R-37 escarabajo 


Nihilbot 


Concept Motorcycle 


Octopus in a Boat 


Dangerous Cereal Killer
